Package Project

Class OrganisationalUnit

java.lang.Object
Project.OrganisationalUnit
public class OrganisationalUnit
extends java.lang.Object
This class holds all the functionality and information for the organisation units.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    OrganisationalUnit()
    Empty organisational constructor for the GUI.
    OrganisationalUnit​(java.lang.String name, double credits)
    Organisational Unit Constructor without pending credits.
    OrganisationalUnit​(java.lang.String name, int intCred, int pendingCred)
    Organisational Unit Constructor with pending credits.

      Empty organisational constructor for the GUI.

    • OrganisationalUnit

      public OrganisationalUnit​(java.lang.String name, double credits)
      Organisational Unit Constructor without pending credits.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the organisational unit.
      credits - The credit balance the organisational unit has.

    • OrganisationalUnit

      public OrganisationalUnit​(java.lang.String name, int intCred, int pendingCred)
      Organisational Unit Constructor with pending credits.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the organisational unit.
      intCred - The credit balance the organisational unit has.
      pendingCred - The pending credits balance.

    • getOrg

      public static int getOrg​(java.lang.String orgName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Retrieves the organisation ID from its name for user creation.
      Parameters:
      orgName - The name of the organisational unit.
      Returns:
      The ID of the organisational unit.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

    • getOrgUnit

      Retrieve the credit amount of an organisational unit.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unt to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Returns the organisational unit if it exists, otherwise returns null.

    • getOrgUnitID

      public static java.lang.Integer getOrgUnitID​(int userID)
      Uses the userID to return the organisational unit the user belongs to.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user to find organisational unit for.
      Returns:
      Returns the organisational unit ID if it exists, otherwise returns null.

    • getCredits

      public static java.lang.Double getCredits​(int orgUnitID)
      Returns the credit amount of an organisational unit.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit to get the credits from.
      Returns:
      The credits of the organisational unit if it could be retrieved, otherwise returns null.

    • orgUnitExists

      public java.lang.Boolean orgUnitExists​(java.lang.String name)
      Searches for an organisational unit in the database using its name to see if it exists.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the organisational unit to search for.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the organisational unit exists, false otherwise.

    • getAllUnits

      public javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel getAllUnits() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Used to create table model for organisational units in the GUI - lists all current organisational units.
      Returns:
      A DefaultTableModel if the organisations could be found.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

      Parameters:
      user - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      A list holding the user organisation ID.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.

      Returns the pending credit amount of an organisational unit.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit to get the pending credits from.
      Returns:
      The pending credits of the organisational unit if it could be retrieved, otherwise returns null.

    • addPending

      public static void addPending​(int orgUnitID, double addCredits)
      Takes credits from an organisational unit and adds them to the pending column.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit to add to.
      addCredits - The credits to add to pending.

    • revertPending

      public static void revertPending​(int orgUnitID, double removeCredits)
      Takes credits from the pending column and adds them back to the organisational unit.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit to add back to.
      removeCredits - The credits to remove from pending.

    • removePending

      public static void removePending​(int orgUnitID, double spentCredits)
      Removes spent credits from the pending column of an organisational unit.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The ID of the organisational unit.
      spentCredits - The credits spent to remove from pending.

    • getOrgUnit

      public static OrganisationalUnit getOrgUnit​(java.lang.String orgName)
      Retrieves the information of an organisational unit using its name.
      Parameters:
      orgName - The name of the organisational unit.
      Returns:
      The organisational unit if it exists, otherwise returns nul.

    • usersExist

      public static java.lang.Boolean usersExist​(int orgUnitID) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Check if an organisation has any users.
      Parameters:
      orgUnitID - The organisational unit to check.
      Returns:
      True if there are user in the organisation, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - when something goes wrong with the database.
